With 2 tickets our checkin baggage was within the limit but because they added our hand baggage to Our checkin we were asked to pay extra- and they charge a hefty amount of 400Rs per kg. The rest of the Journey was made worse by the under construction Kanpur airport, they have limited staff and faulty equipment which makes the passenger experience a terrible ordeal.

Title: "Worst experience"
Name: Kamal Gupta
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | Bengaluru to Delhi. Worst experience. Travelled several times Indigo but never faced issue. Spicejet is not at all customer friendly. Rude tone of staff. Not managed properly. Seriously in my life no one I know will book Spicejet again.

Title: "do this re-scheduling a lot"
Name: S Manehar
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Mangalore to Bangalore. The flight was originally scheduled at 7.35 PM and got postponed to 9.15 PM a week before the scheduled date. And looks like they do this re-scheduling a lot. Why have so many itineraries to select from while booking if you actually cannot run those? I called up the Customer Care and requested to change the flight to 5.40 PM which is available, just so that the risk of missing the connecting flight is less. But I was told about the policies and stuff that I have to pay the Ticket Fare + Change Penalty if I have to get it changed. Seriously guys!? is this what you call customer service? The flight is re-scheduled by 15 Min less than 2 Hrs which is the minimum time interval required for the ticket to be rescheduled free of cost according to "Policy". When you say "Sorry, we regret the inconvenience caused", at least try to make up to the customer rather than making more money out of the customer's inconvenience.

Title: "flight delayed by 5 hours"
Name: Roshith Kattungal
Review: Not Verified |  Cochin to Chennai. Worst experience in flying. The flight was delayed by 5 hours and the crew had no information even about the time at which flight was rescheduled. They could have at least informed in advance so that I could have opted for another flight. Even though they know about the matter they kept mum. Never opt for this flight.

Title: "bad and worst experience"
Name: Sailaja Sarbada
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Bangalore to Hyderabad. Worst experience. No proper response from the SpiceJet team. In the check in queue all not sending passengers in queue . Least bothered staff. Also flight got delayed by 30 mins but no information until asked. When I went and asked they are telling like we updated in the board but they updated the time I asked. Unprofessional people. Really very bad and worst experience.

Title: "really bad service"
Name: L Sharma
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Delhi to Bangkok. Good price but really bad service. They did not carry enough water bottles for all the passengers. In fact, they did not even have much food or other beverage options for customers on the later rows of the plane. They had one bottle of water for 10 rows at the back. Had to call the attendant multiple times to get anything at all. Seats were ok, not too bad. The flight was also hot since the AC wasn't too effective. Only use as last resort if you don't have other flight options available. Much better to pay more for other airlines.

Title: "worst airline company"
Name: R Sharman
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Guwahati to Pakyong. Spicejet is the worst airline company. They cancel flights when they could not sell there full tickets and blame the cancellation to bad weather condition. They do not have the decency to inform the passengers beforehand so that they can arrange for an alternative. You will know about the cancellation at airport. Thereafter you will have to run to Spicejet office and request them to refund your money.

Title: "always a delay"
Name: Rohit Suri
Review: Not Verified | Jaipur to Varanasi. Consistent airline - always a delay! I have an experience of delay in all trips while travelling with Spicejet. It takes something to be so consistent in wasting the passengers time. The ground staff is arrogant while addressing the issue. They are obviously obliging you by providing you the airlines although the flight attendants are courteous. Need to learn to be punctual and timely intimating the passengers about the delay.

Title: "ticket without check in baggage"
Name: Subhrajit Chakravorty
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Kolkata to Silchar. Spicejet should start begging on the road holding a bowl, instead of flying aeroplanes. I was issued a ticket without check in baggage. I was carrying a laptop bag and another small bag. Seeing this 2 bags spicejet charged me Rs 400/- extra.

Title: "improve before its too late"
Name: M Kaliya
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Coimbatore to Delhi. Improve before its too late. I don’t usually do this but the reason for writing this review is manifold. Firstly, the delay in flight time owing to poor weather conditions, its hard to comprehend how other airlines can operate on time in similar conditions. I just hope the delay was not caused to the airline staff. Secondly, if flight is delayed then the same can be conveyed well in advance to avoid any inconvenience to a lady travelling with a toddler. Thirdly, this really tested my patience, the rude and indifferent behaviour of the lady at the counter at Coimbatore airport. She was not not considerate enough to check in the hand baggage meant for the baby and insisted that the same should be caaried in cabin. I wonder if its the AUW that counts and other airlines can consider, why same thing could not be replicated by the Spice jet. Overall, it was a nightmare and a horrible experience. I wish I didn't have to travel this airline again. For you own sake, improve before its too late.

Title: "Please improve your service"
Name: Prashant Ramakrishnan
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Kolkata to Chennai. Flight delayed by 1.5 hrs and notification of delay provided 1.5 before check in. This is third time Spicejet is cancelling it's flight due to operational reasons in last 2 months of my travel. Please improve your service.

Title: "a very rude behaviour"
Name: Biju Bharali
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Delhi to Guwahati. They destroyed a super wonderful journey of mine. They charged a huge amount of money for a little extra luggage and in spite of repeatedly informing them about fragile luggage they destroyed my belongings. No other flights had any problem with the on the cabin luggage including international airlines. Spicejet had a very rude behaviour. Never ever board this flight. Worst experience ever.

Title: "not at all customer friendly"
Name: P Hanarao
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Mumbai to Visakhapatnam via Hyderabad. Spicejet not at all customer friendly, charging 400 INR/ kg for extra baggage is too much. I paid 4000 rs for extra 10 kg which is equal to my flight ticket cost. And the interesting part was when I go by other airlines with same luggage travelled smoothly, but with Spicejet scenorio is different, think twice before going.

Title: "overall service is very poor"
Name: T Pamava
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Mumbai to Hubli. Spicejet counter staff is very irresponsible. Laptop bag is allowed extra in all airlines. But Spicejet airline counts laptop weight in baggage. Also overall service is very poor.

Title: "won't recommend SpiceJet"
Name: Suneel Kumar Jillella
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Hyderabad to Guwahati. Cannot adjust the seat and less space. The seats are comfortable for casual passenger. I lost my peace in SpiceJet. I will never again travel through SpiceJet. And won't recommend people to travel with SpiceJet.

Title: "unprofessional staff"
Name: T Andreu
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | Delhi to Jammu. Will never fly this airline again. Very unprofessional staff. We were travelling with two kids coming from an international flight. They charged us for every gram in plus. Had to pay for the extra weight more than the actual ticket. Thieves!!

Title: "never recommend Spicejet"
Name: Pradipkumar Patel
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Ahmedabad to Delhi . I am travel agent from Gandhinagar, Gujarat. I have recently travelled with my family first time with your company. It was worst of worst experience to fly with SpiceJet. On the airport Sign board only Spicejet flights were late, and due to the delayed flight we missed our Sightseeing and reached hotel very late! I dont understand why only Spicejet flight has many problems.  I will never recommend Spicejet to all clients.

Title: "flight timing was changed"
Name: Renu Sinha
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | Varanasi to Jaipur. The flight timing was changed without any information. I am an old lady and was waiting at the airport for more than 4 hours, without any assistance from the airline members. On asking why has the airline not informed, they gave me an excuse that sms to all members have been sent and it is not their responsibility, if I have not got the sms. No courtesy at all.

Title: "very helpful and friendly"
Name: Sridhar Pemasani Mohamdoss
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Chennai to Vijayawada. The excellent service you could never ask for, value for money! Specially, two cabin crew members are very helpful and friendly. I wish them all the best. Keeping doing this good service with smile.

Title: "No clear updates"
Name: Sabesan Ramani
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | Took the flight for a one hour journey from Coimbatore to Chennai. It got delayed by close to 3 hours. No clear updates at the counters and no refreshments offered and the after all this when we boarded the aircraft, house keeping was bad. Will never take SpiceJet again

Title: "horrible experience"
Name: C Ramhary
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Mumbai to Ahmedabad. Will never travel again. 3 hours flight was delayed very unprofessional work, horrible experience not worth the money I don’t recommend.

Title: "I won't recommend"
Name: Balakumar Thanulingam
Review: Not Verified |  Delhi to Madurai via Chennai. Very rare I'm using Spice jet. Last week I've booked Spice max. When I entered for Priority Check-in, the staff in that counter didn't allow me without ask me anything. Later I had check-in in normal counter, explained about this, they didn't even apologize. There is no Priority check-in. Food is average. Flight was around 1hr of delay. Finally no priority bag out. So guys, please don't book Spice max, They are just grabbing money from you. Its completely useless. I had very worst experience with Spice jet. I'm Gold member of Jet airways. Unfortunately I didn't get seat that day. I'll never come again Spice jet. I won't recommend to anyone.

Title: "will never travel again"
Name: Bilal Aladia
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Mumbai to Dubai. Worst flight. I will never travel again. Charging for every thing giving such a costly ticket but without meal. Please be a domestic airline, don't go for international.

Title: "never recommend Spicejet"
Name: Praveen Reddy
Review:
✅ Trip Verified |  
Hubli to Hyderabad. Worst of the worst. They can’t operate as per schedule.  My international flights and all the programs are rescheduled because of this airline. I will never recommend Spicejet airlines in my life!

Title: "experienced it overall as good"
Name: P Torven
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Colombo to Goa via Chennai. All flights were on time and the airplanes were very new. I had only hand luggage. They really check the weight, so make sure you only bring 7 kilos or take something out before they weigh it. They only provide you one cup of free water (maybe you can ask for more), but it was no problem to bring my own little bottle of water. When your luggage get checked at the airport, they don't throw the bottle away. For food you have to pay and it seemed like they have only factory fabricated kind of food. But this was also no problem, as my flights were very short. The flight attendants were young girls and they were friendly. I experienced it overall as good.

Title: "they are so inefficient"
Name: Seana Harvey
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Jaipur to Goa via Ahmedabad . Save your money and don’t fly with them. 4.5 hours turned into 8.5 hrs. More time was spent waiting than actually in air flying. No communication was given as we were herded like sheep from one security point to the next. Initially the flight was late 1.5 hours. We flew to Ahmedabad which was 55 minutes. The same plane flight was to continue on to Goa. However it didn’t. Everyone continuing on to Goa was asked to stay seated and present their ticket. Ten minutes later another passenger informed us we had to change planes. We exited to a bus which took us out of the airport then back in- through security once again then made to wait an additional 2.5 hours. Originally to be in Goa at 4:10pm actual arrival 8:30pm. Not to mention their staff is terrible, no smiles, compassion, communication. I was shocked at how little we were told about what was going on. I thought Spicejet was a reputable company but they are so inefficient it’s ridiculous. They did off meal vouchers for the inconvenience. I would have preferred a customer service agent that didn’t stare blankly and say he accepted the situation but would do nothing to resolve it.

Title: "the worst experience"
Name: S Buhmari
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Delhi to Pune. I travelled SpiceJet for the first time & this was the worst experience as compared to other airlines. They are charging for checkin bag, you can carry only hand bag - if your carrying checkin bag you have to pay for that as per the weight. In SpiceJet the seat arrangements are very compact as compared to other airlines, you can't stretch your legs properly. There will be no complementary food, you have to pay for food. The crew & airport staff don't know how to treat the customers, they are very rude.

Title: "the worst web site"
Name: Vishal Tarolkar
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Pune to Dubai. I would mention here that their Web Site is the worst web site of all I have so far dealt with. Its not reliable at all. As we have limited options in that price range one has to deal with this issue all the time.

Title: "Spicejet is a very cheap"
Name: C Armand
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | Delhi to Guwhati. Sat on my seat and saw a used spoon and a knife left there in the magazing holder. I asked the staff to take it away to which she replied leave it there, I'll take it later. Actually, you should have taken it away even before you started boarding. Spicejet is a very cheap and fast way to travel but I guess that does not mean you can drop your standards that low, leaving dirty cutlery from the last passengers for the new ones. I am still paying big bucks.

Title: "It feels like hell"
Name: Suhas Thambi Kareparambil
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | Dubai to Cochin. Worst airline in the world. They charge all the cabin luggage. My cabin bag was 7kg when checking at home. SpiceJet says it is 7.4 kg, ask me to pay extra charge for 1 kg. Also they charge me extra for Duty free items purchased from airport. Safety belt hook was not working in my seat. Toilet are dirty and flush not working properly. Passage is too narrow, congested. Flight delay 40 minutes for take off without any reason. Delay of luggage on arrival. It feels like hell.

Title: "Never recommend"
Name: N Ison
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | New Delhi to Varanasi. Spicejet has turned out to be my worst flight experience till now. This is the only airline that thinks telling passengers about the flight delay is not necessary as they delay their flights daily. I was travelling to varanasi on 30/10/18 10.10 am flight and a had a same day return via IndiGo 6.30 pm flight. After reaching airport I got to know the flight is delayed by 3 hrs, I had received no message or email so I decided to postpone my trip to next day after paying 4k as penalty for rescheduling IndiGo to next day and guess what next - same story next day. Moral of the story is Spicejet sucks. Rating negative. Never recommend.

Title: "improve on time performance"
Name: P Gamesh
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Guwahati to Chennai. SpiceJet can hardly be relied upon for punctuality. The thing to be noticed is that it is in major routes and also that the delays are huge whenever they happen. So if one has a connecting flight, train or bus, one has to keep fingers crossed. Risky. The airline needs to improve on time performance.

Title: "I have to buy a new ticket"
Name: S Hawati
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Chennai to Madurai. Extremely unhappy- I was told at 7:20 am that the doors had closed for a 7:50 am flight, for a 7:25am boarding time! Have no luggage at all, the counter sent me to ticketing and they just said that I have to buy a new ticket. Took the next flight after paying 5K for 9:50am and the gates to board haven’t opened at 9:45am. I have been warned by others that this is the worst of them all! Shame on you

Title: "The very worst airline"
Name: Kamlesh Pillai
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Dubai to Mumbai. The very worst airline. They are calculating even the laptop weight also even though the flight is almost empty. I will consider not to use this airline in entire journey.

Title: "never travel SpiceJet again"
Name: Sachin Singh
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  I booked a return ticket Mumbai to Delhi and now on my return journey they are using me to pay Rs. 400 more because on my return ticket they have printed "hand baggage fare only". This is a sly underhand way of extracting money from their customers. How is it possible this was not printed on my ticket from BOM-DEL? They are blaming IRCTC for this and saying don't book through IRCTC. Why are they selling tickets through 3rd parties? I am never going to travel with SpiceJet again.

Title: "you must pay for everything"
Name: R Vincent
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | Flew Spicejet from Tirupati to Hyderabad as I travel for my holidays to SE Asia. Like many have said on this site, this is probably the worst Indian airline to travel with. In comparison with IndiGo or Vistara, nothing is free, you must pay for everything. The ticket price is not that cheap compared to other Indian airline, the story began when the flight was delayed for more than an hour without communication with us. After that, we boarded an old plane with nothing onboard - tight legroom, rude staff, A/C not working, toilet disgusting etc. Luckily, the flight was not that and was still able to made in to my flight at 10 pm to get on my flight to SE Asia via Dubai. My advice - don't travel on Spicejet if you can help. Try and fly another airline whenever possible.

Title: “I expect better”
Name: Vinayak Mohan
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | I'm deeply disappointed with my recent experience with Vistara Airlines. My booking was unexpectedly canceled without my consent or any prior communication, allegedly due to a fraud alert from my bank. Despite my repeated requests for clarification and proof, Vistara has failed to provide a satisfactory explanation or address my concerns professionally. This lack of transparency and communication has caused significant inconvenience, both financially and in terms of time. A mere refund is not enough to compensate for the stress and trouble caused by this mishandling. I expect better from a reputed airline like Vistara, and I urge them to address such issues more responsibly in the future.

Title: Vistara customer review
Name: Gaurav Kulkarni
Review: Not Verified |  Vistara is overall good .The seats were comfortable the food was kind of okayish, staff service on point, inflight entertainment was okay. This my first time flying with Vistara and i am sure that i will be flying again with this airline. The ground service could have been more better than this, the bus took a little bit of time.

Title: "arrogant crew member"
Name: Vikas Verma
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Extremely impolite and ill mannered cabin crew. Instead of giving a reply to a simple question, an arrogant crew member got into an argument in the most insulting tone. Even his colleagues were visibly disturbed by his behaviour. Some people lack basic etiquettes and cannot be trusted with hospitality spaces. But does the airline care? Of course not.

Title: "really nice experience"
Name: M Saju
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  It was really nice experience, this was my first journey with Vistara. I am 6.2 feet height and still I was able to sit comfortably. They provided food also, after long time get food in Indian domestic flight was a good feel. Every days we used to get in jet and kingfisher airlines. It was a nice experience, now waiting for my connecting flight to Dubai.

Title: “on-board experience is a bit so-so”
Name: P Reddy
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | The on-ground experience was great, very pleasant check-in experience, the Adani lounge has a separate section for Vistara Frequent Fliers and Business Class which is quite nice. The on-board experience is a bit so-so, the legroom in economy is fairly tight and feels less than Indigo. They have cut-down on the quantity of food in meals visibly in economy class. The IFE was good enough to keep oneself entertained and thankfully with the middle seat remaining empty, the flight was quite comfortable.

Title: "onboard experience was amazing"
Name: S Hunsel
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  A late night flight (10 pm) delayed by almost 45 minutes is not the most pleasant beginning to the journey, especially given the horrible Encalm Lounge in Delhi (dirty, crowded, rubbish food). However, the onboard experience was amazing, the A321 has lie-flat seats with large IFE screens (which is a treat, since I could sleep comfortably for over an hour in a less than 2 hour flight). The cabin crew were prompt, helpful and very attentive. Upto 4 food choices and a pretty good spread. The IFE screens were great and the entertainment catalog is good enough for a short domestic flight but would be a bit boring for a 4-5 hour or above flight. However, baggage claim experience was not the best, despite the baggage being priority tagged it arrived after 60-65% of the co-passengers in the flight had received their bags, and when you are running over an hour late, it was a bit frustrating.

Title: "Extremely disappointed"
Name: Kirti Dubey
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  I faced a helpless situation with Vistara. No staff present, no proper guidance provided, and so much time wasted. Even after trying to contact the staff, I had to wait for an unbearably long time, and they were not at all helpful. If the management was better, I wouldn't have missed my flight even after reaching 50 minutes before. I would strongly advise anyone to choose another airline where at least you receive proper guidance and don't have to wait for staff to show up. Very disheartened by the airline; this was a very, very bad experience. Extremely disappointed with Vistara.

Title: "the experience was wonderful"
Name: M Hanajan
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Boarding time at Delhi T3 was at 5:45 but boarding was complete by 6:15 and flight took off at 6:45 rather than 6:30. The cabin crew onboard was attentive and caring, My seat was 5-A i was travelling with my family in premium economy . The food was superb and the quantity was more then sufficient. flight landed before time, the plane was in top-notch condition and inflight entertainment was working properly. Overall, the experience was wonderful!

Title: “cabin crew were warm and efficient”
Name: T Reddy
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | The flight from Bengaluru to Mumbai was on-time and pleasant. The cabin crew were warm and efficient, the legroom was comfortable, one is truly going to miss Vistara once it merges with Air India. If there are a couple of areas of concern, it would be the food, the quantity was generous but tasteless. The other area would be that in seat selection, if they can point out the restricted recline seats during seat selection.

Title: "prefer not being served anything"
Name: Shreyans Sheth
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  We were provided inflight meal they started from back of the plane and tray collection started from front of the plane i.e Row 7 where economy class starts. One crew begin from business and first ended up with just serving those six rows and few passengers of seventh row of economy within 6-8 minutes of food being served tray collection begin and meanwhile i was eating which felt very dehumanising she just pulled off the tray while i was eating and there was stuff left in tray. After my tray being taken away i had trash left and i pressed call button no-one came for 10 mins after that descent began and seatbelt signs were on and then lady arrives and askes me to close the tray. I asked her what about trash, I was told to put in seat pocket in front of me. I would prefer not being served anything rather than being treated like this. On time performance was good but i prefer ordering speciality meal as it gets served earlier.

Title: “I was thoroughly impressed”
Name: Rajesh Bhimani
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  I am writing to express my utmost satisfaction with the service provided by Mr. Neeraj and Ms. Nikita. Their dedication and excellent service have left a lasting impression on me and my family during our recent visit. I was thoroughly impressed by the professionalism and attentiveness.

Title: “Crew members very hospitable”
Name: Alok Mishra
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | Probably one of the best for the route. Ground handling both at departure and transit at Delhi was more than good. Check in very quick. Food I would rate the best offered on this route. Crew members very hospitable. Flight smooth and on time.

Title: "my request was rejected"
Name: Kunal Shah
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  I’ve been suffering from severe back pain and when I received a broken seat, and requested to be shifted to another seat, I was told that there are no other seats available. Since I was genuinely uncomfortable I walked around the aircraft to check if any other seats available. I saw multiple empty seats in the premium economy and requested to move there. I was refused by cabin crew and then even after requesting the inflight supervisor my request was rejected. This used to be my favourite airline but just so put off by this behaviour. Gone are the days of actually caring to or just trying to make your customer comfortable and happy.

Title: "experience has been excellent"
Name: G Kan
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  It’s my first round trip on Vistara Airline ever. I am happy to share the experience has been excellent all around. I normally fly exclusively on Singapore Airline, but Vistara is an excellent choice now for my India route.

Title: "not received compensation"
Name: Belal Habib
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  The flight was delayed by a day and the airline agreed to recompense hotel stays for one night. To recover compensation I witnessed appalling customer service. I still have not received compensation despite agreement from the airline to pay. The flight itself was great.

Title: "The flight wasn't bad"
Name: Mike Flynn
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  The flight wasn't bad. Seat okay in refurbished cabin. Staff were welcoming in small cabin. Food was alright but limited. Entertainment limited for English speakers but survived the shortish flight. Not bad overall but returning to UK via Qatar.

Title: "Vistara flights were delayed or either cancelled"
Name: Shama Joseph
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  I came to the gates at 6pm on April 1, 2024 for the 7:30pm flight. It’s April 2, 2024 and I’m still at the airport to board another flight as I’ve never seen such an irresponsible set of staff. It was a day when many Vistara flights were delayed or either cancelled. When they were not onboarding even after 7pm, when we asked the officer at the gate, he informed that the flight is delayed and will take off by 11:30pm. Till we asked, no updates were given by the Vistara staffs. The flight status was showing “on time” and “security” even at 8pm. The flight arranged dinner for us and by 11:50pm, we were on-boarded to the flight. But the flight didn’t take off even at 12:30am on April 2, 2024. When checked with the cabin crew, they informed that the captain of the flight parked the flight and went away. Now only first officer is available. And they are waiting for another captain to come and take the flight. The cabin crew also has been waiting since 6pm on April 1, 2024. Then the first officer (very helpful and gentle man) informed us that by 1:15am he will inform us the decision of the flight is going or getting cancelled. By 1:30am we were informed the flight is rescheduled to 5am. When we asked for confirmation that f the flight, they said they cannot confirm until 4am. Only then they can know if any captain can come and fly the plane to Kochi. So they de-boarded us from the plane and we were sent to the arrival area to reclaim our baggage. In the flight we were informed if we need a refund, it will be done at the arrival. When we reached the arrival, we came to know that no such information is given to the arrival. So we strongly asked for a cancellation and confirmation on refund. They were not willing to give the confirmation. I said I need the confirmation of refund. Finally the staff at the arrival got a WhatsApp message of my PNR full refund confirmation. I booked another Indigo flight to Kochi at 10:10am and I’m at the airport since yesterday 6pm. Just now while typing this message, I got a call from Vistara that the flight which was supposed to leave at 5am did not go yet and now they are ready to fly to Kochi. I asked what was the purpose of the call? They informed me the flight is only left with 6 passengers (it was almost a full flight) and if we are willing, they are ready to take us. I said no. Had they properly updated all passengers from time to time, they could have avoided this issue and such a hat-redness towards this airlines. I was supposed to reach my home at 10:30pm yesterday. Who will take responsibility of the stress and strain I went through?

Title: “airline does not respond at all”
Name: J Cerny
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | I purchased tickets from Munich to Colombo for five people. In Munich, we checked in three suitcases for our entire family of five. Upon arrival in Colombo, Sri Lanka on 15 February 2024, it was discovered that not a single piece of luggage had been delivered. Two of the three suitcases were delivered to us after five days on February 20. The third suitcase was not delivered. On departure from Colombo on March 4th, I was informed at the Vistara counter that the suitcase was not found. While in Sri Lanka, they ignored all the emails sent asking about the luggage. The phone line is impossible to call. On the way back from Colombo to Munich, one of the three backpacks was not delivered again. Fortunately, they brought it home to us after a few days. However, the original baggage checked in on the way there remains lost. The airline does not respond at all to emails sent requesting compensation. Finally, they wrote yesterday: With reference to your email, we would like to inform you that as per the investigation the baggage was delivered to you. Hence, we are unable to assist you further. We again apologize for the delay of the baggage. We look forward to welcoming you on board in the future. Incredibly. Due to the approach to customers, I recommend avoiding this company.

Title: "A negative experience"
Name: R Keytir
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  A negative experience with Vistara. Indian staff in Mumbai the worst between all airlines which I used.  Our flight was from Frankfurt by Mumbai to Colombo (and return). In way to Mumbai connection was relatively short (3h) and Vistara staff informed us that I don’t need to go to immigration (stay in transit) and is not necessary start execution of my Visa promise (ETA) which was valid to day of arrive to Mumbai.  After 2 weeks when we returned immigration office didn’t allowed us to leave the airport (connection was long – above 24 hours and Vistara not secured transit hotel). When Vistara staff was called from Immigration to offer service for customers staff of Vistara wanted to send us again to transit are promised us to arrange transit hotel, to organize meal, water etc. But procedure which used was clever, every 100-200 meters they sent us to another person, and last one – before secure control promised that up stairs will wait another Vistara representative who will help us. Upstairs was duty free area without any Vistara office/ desk. Without also possibility to return. We were left in the lurch and we lost our hotel reservation in Mumbai without any Vistara help, without any compensation. If are any problems not expect help and support from staff. Our luggage didn’t arrive from Mumbai and we got it only thanks Lufthansa support after 10 days.

Title: "the staff were amazing"
Name: Gupta Abhimanyu
Review: Not Verified |   Vistara were very welcoming to us on both fights. Their service was really good, the seats were really clean and tidy and the staff were amazing. Enjoyed the flight, staff were so polite

Title: "an amazing experience"
Name: Nirali Patel
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  We had an amazing experience with Vistara Mumbai staff. While travelling with a 10 mo baby we unfortunately got late for the check in. Even though the check in had closed 10 minutes ago they understood our situation and escorted us till the gate to make sure we did not miss our flight! Special thanks to Manas and Aparna and the whole staff for being so supportive. Aparna helped us throughout till the gate and even made the ground staff at airport aware of the situation. We would missed the flight definitely had it not been for these awesome people! I would rate the airline 11/10 if I could!

Title: “a mistake indeed”
Name: K Reddy
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | First time I ever book an international flight with Indian airline company (I'm flying across globe since 12years). That was a mistake indeed! Initially flight got cancelled by airline and i just accepted next day booking without any bargain. Later I had to cancel due to family circumstancess and since then my refund is stuck. Vistara is saying they refunded to my TA (booking.Com) and my TA saying they haven't. Finally, Vistara today accepted that they haven't processed it! all this took hell of follow-up e-mails, calls and so far no result. What a poor process Vistara has while world is moving towards industry 5.0! So don't book with Vistara (especially via TA) if you have fraction of chance to cancel it!

Title: “Worst service ever”
Name: Payal Patel
Review: Not Verified | Worst service ever. I was flying with family and allotted separate seats on online check in. No options given to choose seats. Staff at the airport was not ready to listen or help. Ruined my family trip time. My previous experience with Vistara was not good either. They lost my check in bag. Its been 11 months still not found and I haven't been compensated for baggage lost. Wouldn't recommend this airline.

Title: "genuine smiles and positive attitude"
Name: Diya Puthur
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Kudos to the cabin crew on UK896 (IFS Rachna and her team) for their genuine smiles and positive attitude throughout the flight. Their cheerful demeanor created a welcoming atmosphere on board. The cabin crew's attention to detail was commendable. From keeping the cabin tidy to promptly responding to requests, their commitment to maintaining a high standard of service did not go unnoticed.

Title: "Extremely poor experience2
Name: A Kadyta
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Extremely poor experience, no information on flight delay. Poor ground process management and flight experience not up to the mark.

Title: "fly again with this airline"
Name: Gunter Neeb
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |   Its been a few years when I flew a lot in Asia, so flying this time to India with Vistara was a surprise: The check-in was swift, the service immaculate (especially the stewardess Eshey. The biggest surprise was the menu, an how delicious the different choices were done. Except from the nowadays still rubbery buns, we had Indian and Oriental menus with tastes, The only disappointment was that a plane as big as the 787 had to squeeze in a 3-3-3 arrangement in this class, when I expected 2-3-2. But - all in all - I would always fly again with this airline, provided the service remains that excellent.

Title: “future flights only by Vistara”
Name: Maria Romel
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | International experience on domestic flight! I wonder why I did not choose Vistara, ever before? Maybe because I always chose the lowest flight rates. But, the marginally higher rate gave me an opportunity to enjoy comfortable seat, watch a movie, play game, inclusive of delicious hot food and of course, timely arrival and departure. Thanks a lot Vistara! Wish you lot of success. Will ensure, future flights only by Vistara.

Title: "impeccable service delivery"
Name: Ibrahim Mohammed
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |   I recently had the pleasure of flying with Vistara, and I must say it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. The cabin crew, led by the remarkable team of Jibran, Nevil, and Anuradha, truly set Vistara apart as one of the best airlines in the industry. From the moment I stepped on board, the warmth and professionalism of the cabin crew were evident. Jibran's leadership was evident in the seamless coordination of the team, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable journey for all passengers. Their attention to detail and commitment to customer satisfaction were truly commendable. Nevil's friendly demeanor and proactive approach made the flight a delightful experience. He was attentive to passengers' needs, creating a welcoming atmosphere throughout the journey. Anuradha's dedication to service excellence was evident in her impeccable service delivery, making every passenger feel valued and well taken care of. The entire team, including the unsung heroes working in the background, contributed to making this flight stand out. The immaculate condition of the cabin, the punctuality of the flight, and the overall professionalism exhibited by the crew reflect Vistara's commitment to providing a top-notch travel experience. I look forward to future travels with Vistara, confident that I will continue to receive exceptional service.

Title: "happy about the wheelchair service"
Name: Jitendra Nath Kapoor
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Extremely happy about the wheelchair service given by Mr Singh, in spite of the first wheelchair guy leaving my wife at the boarding waiting area, this person with a smile took my wife till the airplane entrance, great service. The crew was par excellent in all manner, keep it up, i will be for sure traveling by air Vistara only.

Title: "the bassinet seats were already sold out"
Name: Ishan Kumar
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Before booking the flight, I called customer care and asked whether we would be availed with the bassinet or not and we were informed that the bassinet seats are given to the parents on a first come first serve basis. Once check-in was enabled we were assigned with default seats and they were not next to the bassinet so we called the customer care again to confirm. We were instructed by the customer care person to not change the default allocated seats and asked us to reach 4 hours before departure time to the airport as bassinet seats can only be assigned to parents at the airport while boarding. So we did as instructed and reached Paris airport before 4 hours departure but to our surprise all the bassinet seats were already sold out. As per ground staff there are 2 bassinets in economy out of which one bassinet is taken by a parent and other seat next to bassinet is assigned to a lady travelling alone. Ground staff assured us that they will make a request to the lady and ask her to swap the seat with one of us so we can have the bassinet for our daughter. When boarding was about to start (same ground staff present who said they will make the request) we reminded again to the staff but as per them the lady was still not there so we were again asked to go ahead and they will make a request once she will board the flight and we again trusted them. Now once we boarded the flight , the crew in flight said they can not request someone to give their seats to us and it's no longer possible to have the bassinet seat. The best thing we found in this entire scenario is that none of the bassinet seats were assigned to parents. All those seats were sold to individuals (we were lied by the ground staff saying that its given to a parent but all three person sitting were individuals and not even travelling together as a family) who paid for extra leg space so my question is why are those seats called bassinet seats at all and you even say it to parents that those seats are designed for parents travelling with kids and can be only given to the parents on first come first basis when this is not at all followed by your staff or your system anywhere? We requested multiple times from the customer care to let us choose those seats beforehand and we were even ready to pay for the charge also? Even after doing this much followup a simple thing can not be done by your staff then am not sure how you are operating this big airline. We would have happily travelled with our daughter without bassinet if those seats were given to other parents with higher needs but those seats were assigned to individuals with no kids while others were just struggling with their kids.

Title: "highly recommend this airline"
Name: Utkarsh Bundele
Review: Not Verified |  The experience was just wow, right from the luggage check-in counter till the flight. Staffs are professional and ready to assist without any hesitation. Siddhant the flight attendant was exceptional, professional and ready to help promptly with a smile. Thanks for making my journey comfortable and memorable. it was my first fly with Vistara airlines and will not be the last. Will for sure highly recommend this airline. Great job keep it up.

Title: Vistara customer review
Name: HM Joshi
Review: Not Verified |  Now TATA has a Monopoly with control over Vistara and Air India, it’s miserable for passengers. We have business class ticket from BOM-VNS-BOM. Waiting at VNS airport. Flight delayed by several hours. No one to talk to. No lounge access no offer of food or drinks. Only on the video monitors we see flight getting more and more delayed. We have to collect our luggage at BOM airport and manually carry the bags to Swissair, we may not have enough time. There’s no thru checkins.

Title: "served with utmost warmth"
Name: A Taldul
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  It was a breeze from issuing a boarding pass (also a seat of choice) to being seated and served with utmost warmth. Classy Crew full of zest zing and zeal. Ms. Jasmine deserves a special mention - the way she went about settling pax on board and serving in a plea sent infectious manner.

Title: "good flight in economy on Vistara"
Name: S Shetty
Review: Not Verified |  Overall, a good flight in economy on Vistara. The IFE was good, the food and drinks were good and the in-flight service was warm and professional. However, the check-in process was not as per expectations despite access to the priority check-in due to the loyalty program. The staff at the counters were taking a lot of time to check-in individual passengers in the priority lane. If I had to wait in the regular economy queue, I would have missed my flight. Separately a little disappointed that on a previous review of a sub-par experience on my flight from Male to Mumbai in Premium Economy, Vistara's ORM team commented asking for booking details, it has been 10 days since I responded on email and there has not even been an automated acknowledgement of the email forget any action and I have been a CV Gold member for a couple of years now. The ORM team's job cannot be just posting a templated message.

Title: "experience has left a lasting negative impression"
Name: Kiran Subedi
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | My journey involved a flight from Bangalore to Delhi and a connecting flight from Delhi to Kathmandu on a premium economy of Vistara. Unfortunately, the initial flight from Bangalore experienced a half-hour delay, which caused concern as I had a tight connection in Delhi to catch my Vistara flight to Kathmandu. Upon arrival in Delhi, I immediately proceeded to the International transfer office to seek assistance. Regrettably, the Vistara staff informed me that I would not be able to catch my connecting flight. They mentioned they could provide an alternative, and I suggested two possible options: Royal Nepal Airlines A330 and Air India A319/20. However, the staff working there insisted that no alternatives were available and informed me that I had to stay in Delhi for a day. When I requested accommodation, the Vistara staff provided the name of a hotel called "Saptagiri." Concerned about the poor reviews of this hotel on Google Maps, I asked for a better alternative. I was directed to speak with a senior staff member who wore an Air India identity card. This individual was incredibly rude and unhelpful, insisting that I had no choice but to stay at the designated hotel. His behavior was both dominating and frustrating. Upon arriving at the suggested hotel, I found it to be in a deplorable condition, far worse than expected. To my shock, the hotel owner informed me that Vistara Airways had only allocated Rs. 400 per guest for food, which was wholly inadequate. I eventually managed to return via Vistara Air on the 17th, but this entire experience has left a lasting negative impression. I regret to say that I will no longer consider Vistara Airways for my future travels.

Title: "disappointed on the return flight"
Name: S Shetty
Review: Not Verified |  After a fantastic flight from Mumbai to Male on Vistara Premium Economy, I was a bit disappointed on the return flight with the food and crew service. The crew was just not as attentive. The only choice offered was between a veg and non-veg meal. I opted for the non-veg option but the food was not very good, unfortunately I was super hungry by that time. The crew offered beer which was warm and had lost all its fizz. Boarding and onboarding experience were fine, seats quite comfy and the IFE has enough to keep you entertained. Hopefully Vistara standardises the softer parts of the on-board passenger experience to align with the good hard product.

Title: "overall a great experience"
Name: S Shetty
Review: Not Verified |  This was my first international flight with Vistara and overall a great experience. The crew was attentive, menus were offered with options of 4 main courses and even the drinks were refreshed on a short 2.5 hour flight. The Premium Economy seats are quite comfortable and offer lots of legroom. The Vistara IFE has also improved quite a bit and there are enough options to keep you entertained. Overall very impressed with the flight and would look forward to flying a longer international route with them in the future.

Title: "$70 for a slightly larger carry on"
Name: M Walsh
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |   They charged me $70 for having a slightly larger carry on from Cochin to Delhi. The customer service is slow and they are unprofessional in the way they handle extra charges.

Title: "I was completely dissatisfied"
Name: H Saunders
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | I always judge a company on how they handle changes to normal procedure. Vistara 100% fails. I first tried to change my ticket to different date. I tried online and my booking disappeared. I called and was left on hold for over an hour before I gave up. I then tried to cancel my reservation. The service representative simply hung up on me. So, I used the ticket. The airline staff are some of the rudest people in the world. What happened to customer service? The flight was fine. The breakfast was inedible, except for the bread. For lunch there was a Thai dish offered but there was none left by the time the attendant got to me. I had some nonveg chicken dish. It was terrible. One hundred percent inedible. All in all I was completely dissatisfied with Vistara for this trip. A couple of important lessons I learned. First, there's no advantage in flying economy premium. Second, Vistara is fine if you have extremely low expectations and don't try to change anything or deal with customer service. In the future, every time I see the advertisement that Vistara is the best airline in India, I'll probably laugh out loud.

Title: "She was extremely hospitable"
Name: Scott Francis
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  I was on a Vistara flight UK874 from HYD to BOM, and one air hostess Jugnu has been one of the most kindest and genuine air hostess I’ve come across. She was extremely hospitable and just talking to her ensure us a pleasant flight.

Title: "Very bad experience"
Name: Kanwaljit Singh
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | I booked a ticket for 2 from Bangalore to Chandigarh on a single PNR but they allotted us separate middle seats. When I requested them to allot seats together as we are traveling on a single PNR, they simply refused and rather demanded extra money if we need seats together. Very bad experience.

Title: "expect better from a reputed airline"
Name: Nisha Jain
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  They make sure all the seats are under the charged category where you get no option to choose your seats except all the middle seats. With the family of four that option wasn’t feasible. In fact they auto selected the last row which has no Legroom and no recline. It was a tortuous journey where front seat reclines to the max and we have no place to breathe. Why don’t respective authorities seat and experience what oft feels to travel on the last seat. The fact well known than why sell these seats. We expect better from a reputed airline.

Title: "all the best wishes to Vistara"
Name: Akshat Pande
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  We had a very soothing experience at the check in counter at Srinagar airport. Mr Nayeem helped us thoroughly in very comfortable manner at the desk. We really wish all the best wishes to Vistara and its team.

Title: "Terrible service customer service"
Name: K Singh
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | Stay away pay extra and book a more reputable flight airway. Terrible service customer service is a borderline comedy act with no real acceptance of the poor experience on the customer's end. What to expect from Vistara: delayed baggage (by 3 hours) on arrival and then a staff member threatening to remove you from the airline for having a piece of slightly overweight baggage without any form of assistance or actually providing a solution. Then on top of that the pure ridicule of the customer service we've had to deal with after is what you get from Vistara. I implore you after reading this review to please use another service and be better off, it may cost more but for your own sanity, health and wellbeing choose another airline.

Title: "Onboard service was outstanding"
Name: Rajan Parrikar
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Goa Dabolim to Mumbai in Business Class. Our aircraft was equipped with comfortable flatbed seats for the short flight. Onboard service was outstanding. However it took almost an hour for our bags to be loaded onto the carousel. While such delays may be out of the airline's control, the fact that there was neither an announcement nor any staff available to update status reflects poorly on Vistara. Instead of giving a full 10 rating, I will deduct a couple of points for this reason.

Title: "very good service"
Name: Najeem Puthuval
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  When I’m check in from Kochin the counter staff Mr Sabarinath was so nice and kind. Inflight and connection from Mumbai they did perfect timing and very good service. Me and my family very happy traveling with Vistara and suggesting for everyone.

Title: "took it from me saying that it's dangerous"
Name: T Hallej
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  I am traveling and my only way to work out is using my resistance band that I carry along, they took it from me saying that it's dangerous. I have travelled with it internationally many times without any issue and I travel very often.

Title: "Refund us and do the right thing"
Name: R Neesen
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  If should you change the date of your flight you could end up paying twice just as we have. £290.45 is what we are owed since 16th March 2023, despite repeated attempts to get a refund, 9th March we call Vistara air and change our return flight to 16th March, 10th March Vistara email and ask us to upgrade the 16th March flight. 16th March arrive at the airport and we are not booked on the flight, the check in staff tried their best to resolve the issue but couldn't, we had no option but to pay for new seats, assured that we would be refunded. Since then I have passed on all the documents and information at least 10 times to Vistara via direct email, twitter. They initially insisted we hadn't been charged the second time, but I have bank statements to prove we have then they said that we were not entitled to a refund as we took the flights, we know we did, but we paid twice for them Vistara. Refund us and do the right thing

Title: "gave access to lounge for 2 hours"
Name: Read Emmanuel
Review: Not Verified |  Service at airport was horrible and they only gave access to lounge for 2 hours when connecting flight wait is 8 hours.  Staff at the airport lacks knowledge and business ticket means nothing to them.

Title: "Service was really bad"
Name: K Reddy
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | Service was really bad. Food was very bad. They indeed provided the inflight entertainment which one can use in our mobiles but that was not working at all. Air hostess name (Mareena) said in Apple (safari Browser) this type of problems generally comes. They were also lying about the weather. My overall experience was very bad.

Title: "service was truly excellent"
Name: Soumil Gupta
Review: Not Verified |  It was overall an excellent experience, and the service was truly excellent. For example even though it was barely an 1.30 hour journey a whole lunch meal was provided which was of the highest quality and taste and further my grandmother request of fasting which resulted to her being unable to eat the meal provided was dealt in a very wonderful and professional manner with the crew even providing fruits and juice instead. The actual flight was also very smooth and pleasant and there were no delays and we made it on time.

Title: "neat & tidy cabin"
Name: V Ranganathan
Review: Not Verified | Vistara is India's only FSC which offers premium economy seats on selected domestic routes. Recently I flew on Vistara from Coimbatore to Mumbai, my observation is they have neat & tidy cabin, some staffs had smiling face and some don't have any cheer in their face, food was below average, lavatories were clean, IFE can be used in personal devices and was great. Overall a good flight, except that the food taste and selection has to be improved. Soon this airline is going to be merged with Air India, hence hope things will change in the long run.

Title: "customer retention is not a priority"
Name: M Allam
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | International Travelers flying to India with a Domestic connecting flight beware of the misleading luggage allowance and terrible customer service of this Airline. Flew into Mumbai, on a long and exhausting international flight. (Those of you that make these long haul journeys know exactly how I feel) Was booked on a connecting flight to Bengaluru. The check in at Mumbai Airport started with the Business Class and Premium Economy check in counters being roped off. I had to wait to be noticed to be let in. International flights let you check in two bags with a weight allowance of fifty pounds each. International connecting travellers are given the same allowance provided their connecting flight is within forty eight hours of the initial journey for the Domestic sector. I was charged nine thousand rupees extra baggage fees for a two and and a half thousand rupee flight. I asked for the Station Manager was told there are four of them assigned but unavailable. I was not the only victim of this extra baggage fee scam, there were several other international travellers that were facing this unfair extortion. My first service experience with this Airline has been incompetent, unpleasant, unaccommodating and rude, which I was forced to pay extra for. Not something any tired long haul International traveler should have to experience, least of all pay extra for. I sincerely hope that my sharing this unfortunate experience helps you avoid it. Fair, accommodating, competent customer service, "brand loyalty" or "customer retention" is not a priority here.

Title: "staff cheerful, professional and warm"
Name: Vijayendranath D Kabadi
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | UK857 evening flight 9.30 pm from Mumbai to Bengaluru was the finest due to Vistara staff who were cheerful, professional and warm. Felt good keep it up Vistara and wishing you all the best.

Title: "Onboard service was excellent"
Name: Rajan Parrikar
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | Bombay to Dabolim, Goa on A321 in Business Class. Vistara is the best premium domestic airline in India today. Our aircraft was brand new and fitted with flatbed seats in Business Class (I reckon this aircraft is meant for international destinations with longer flight times). Onboard service was excellent and the overall flight experience was pleasant.

Title: "Overall a fantastic experience"
Name: S Shetty
Review: Not Verified |  Overall a fantastic experience with Vistara though the flight was delayed by half hour. The check-in was smooth and quick, the in-air experience was fantastic, there was a wide selection of meals and desserts on offer. The Vistara A321 is perhaps the only flight in which you can experience lie flat seats and a nice big IFE screen in domestic flights within India. The service was prompt and pleasant. Just a few things which could add to the experience - a wider selection of content would be needed for international routes, the content on offer was great for a domestic hop but thin in case the same selection is offered for an international flight. The Encalm lounge in Delhi is a improvement over the previous lounge but still not comparable to the one in Mumbai. I ended up leaving immediately and preferred to use the Amex Lounge over this.

Title: "Worst experience"
Name: Swathi Ramachandran
Review: Not Verified |  Worst experience and that’s with a premium ticket, don’t ever fly with Vistara, they lost my luggage and no updates since 3 days now. They are really useless, inefficient staff working and least bothered. The transit experience from Mumbai was total chaos.

Title: "happy to be back in the air"
Name: S Harashina
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Vistara has for some time been the benchmark in Indian aviation with amazing service and attentive staff. Unfortunately due to personal issues, I was unable to fly for the last 4 months of so and was happy to be back in the air for a trip to Delhi on Vistara. I blocked the first row of economy class since the fare difference between economy and premium economy was quite high for the travel date. While the ground experience remains consistently good pre and post boarding. the in-air experience in economy has been quite degraded. For a morning 6 am flight, Vistara did not offer tea/coffee in economy class. The breakfast was very poor and my omelette was inedible. No condiments except a small roll and butter on offer.  Now coming to the Club Vistara program. I called up Vistara, 2 weeks prior to my flight, as I had 2 Upgrade vouchers and wanted to use one and asked them to recommend a flight on which I could use my upgrade voucher (any flight and ok with either Eco to Prem Eco or Prem Eco to Business) and I was told that no upgrades available even 2 weeks before flying. Imagine my surprise that i could see at least 2-3 empty seats in premium economy in the flight i was traveling in.

Title: "utterly awful experience"
Name: Glen George
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | It was an utterly awful experience from start to finish. I fly this route a lot, usually with Emirates or Qatar and had read some good things so thought I’d try out Vistara business class. The fun started at boarding in Dhaka where there was no business priority and an approx. hour queue to clear security in to the gate where three separate flights were taking off from. Dhaka is an old airport with security at the gates but other airlines manage it just fine. There was only one Vistara employee checking boarding cards and when I asked him about Business priority and told him I would miss the flight he just shrugged and walked off. I only made the flight by taking my life in my hands and queue jumping, nearly causing a riot in the process. The flight Dhaka to Delhi is Premium economy not business - the seat is even labelled as such. Transfer at Delhi very odd - despite having a boarding pass I was escorted to the transfer desk to be given another one. I couldn’t access the WiFi as I hadn’t been sent the code I apparently needed (and no one on board has any). And then having paid $20 for it; it cut off halfway through (despite being advertised as ‘whole flight’) and I had to pay again! And then to cap it off, on arrival at Heathrow the business class bags came off last rather than first, which felt like a good summation of the whole experience. Never again.

Title: "Great experience"
Name: Maitri Sivaraman
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Great experience! Vistara crew were super friendly and also helped me get back my travel accessory when I left it in the flight. Special mention to Mr. Anil Hegde, who went out of his way to help me get back my travel accessory in the midnight! Great team work

Title: "better options are available"
Name: Abhijit Banerjee
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | Not what is expected of a full-service airline that isn't cheap. Decent leg room is the only thing we could compliment about. Very rude cabin staff, running out of food options and delayed flights are just some of the pain points. No Wi-Fi option or infotainment system available. Not recommended when cheaper and better options are available.

Title: "first preference would be Vistara"
Name: Anish Barot
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  I was traveling from Dubai to Ahmedabad connecting Mumbai airport. On Mumbai airport my bag was damaged, I forgot my luggage on arrival waiting lounge and went directly to Vistara desk where Ms. Pooja helped me a lot I really appreciate it because I was extremely tired on that moment but she really made transition very swift & easy. My first preference would be Vistara.

Title: "thanks for the good service"
Name: Vishal Pritwani
Review: Not Verified |  As I am a tall person it was a bit uncomfortable for me and hence there was no option for legroom but compared to other flights I have seen, my experience was also quite good. I hope you will increase the flights from Delhi to Raipur. It was helpful to me after, thanks for the good service.

Title: "appreciate these kind efforts"
Name: Johar Maredia
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  I recently took a trip to Srinagar and on my way back lost my phone at the airport just a while before the boarding. I panicked to find my phone everywhere which was noted by one of the Vistara airport staff named tabasshum who without any questions helped us look for our phone. Another of the airport staff member Suhaib also helped us a lot to find our phone. Both of these members helped us incredibly and sent us our phone back to Mumbai within 24hrs. They were constantly in touch with us till we got our phone and helped us with all the formalities procedures to get the phone. We are very grateful to to both Vistara airlines and specially grateful to these to staff members Suhaib and Tabasshum from Srinagar airport. We really appreciate these kind efforts. And wish to fly again with vistara airlines.

Title: "a wonderful experience"
Name: Aseem Bhattarai
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | It was a wonderful experience flying with VISTARA. The staff are cordial, patient and extremely helpful. They serve well, the food options are top notch and the announcements loud and clear. There is plenty of leg space and the seats are comfortable. The ground are very supportive and help out whenever necessary. I had an international transfer with a transit window of less than an hour in a huge airport. But the transition was seamless thanks to the ground staff of VISTARA. And of course, in a matter of a week, I had four flights, all of which were on time, and I landed ahead of schedule every time.

Title: "service given was excellent"
Name: Lee Tovell
Review: Not Verified | My wife and I (who are both 76) travelled yesterday from Amritsar to New Delhi on the 10.15 flight no. 694. The service given to us was excellent and we would particularly like to commend the staff onboard and on check in.

Title: "treat you like a valued customer"
Name: S Hayle
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Quickly becoming one of my favourite airline to travel with, Vistara treat you like a valued customer. The seat has an adjustable headrest, we were given free headphones for the IFE, a small meal was provided, all on a flight of under an hour! Also left on time and arrived early

Title: "Worst experience I have ever had"
Name: Rupesh Thakkar
Review: Not Verified |  Vistara has given a worst experience of travel during my journey from Ahmedabad to Mumbai on 19 the March 2023. After their confirmation regarding the extra baggage added in the PNR, they didn't allow me to board without charge of extra luggage. It was a hot discussion at the Ahmedabad airport and they treated me with totally rude behaviour and wasted 3 hours at the airport. They don't know the meaning of humbleness and the fact came out that there is not synchronization between their team. Customer team response totally disagreed by their airport team. Since last 35 days, I'm sending chasers to them but received 2 emails that to with incomplete information and denied to give the refund. Worst experience I have ever had in my life for this flight. Highly not recommended. I'm ready to share the further proof if there is a need.

Title: "thank the staff of Vistara"
Name: S Marshad
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  I'd always heard good things about Vistara but never quite understood why and so I couldn't wait for my first flight with Vistara. Not only was the entire journey comfortable with the smoothest landing but I want to especially highlight the service at the checkin counter at Mumbai T2 airport. I'd got the flight timings mixed up and there was a delay at my end admittedly, panic ensued but the staff at Mumbai airport were patient and managed to allow me to board the flight to Kochi. Words can't express my gratitude to Yash, Dolly and especially Sohail sir - a man of few words but your kindness left a huge impact on me. In a sea of horror stories of domestic Indian flights, I want to thank the staff of Vistara for setting an example and keeping the customer at the heart of what you do. Will be singing Vistara's praises for a long time!

Title: "extra for Premium is not really worth it"
Name: W Hasara
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  The seats in the premium economy are in 3-3-3 arrangements compared to the 3-2-3 in the older version of the aircraft. The seat space is similar to the economy with a little more leg space. Paying extra for the Premium is not really worth it. Sometimes the premium economy seats are cheaper only go for it, when this option is available. No wifi on-board on this aircraft, TV sets can't be tilted. If the person sitting in front of you reclines his/her seat you can switch off your screen and plan something else to do. It's the first time to see the newer version of the aircraft is worse than the older one they were using.

Title: "Excellent food, kind staff"
Name: T Rahkina
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  I travelled from Delhi To London with Vistara direct flight in September 2022 on Boeing 787-9. Seats were quite good and comfortable. The inflight experience is also good. The food was excellent for economy class. All the covid policies has been followed by Vistara crew . In short this company is really number one. Excellent food, kind staff, good seats, clean toilet No complaining. Worth the money. Will fly again with Vistara soon.

Title: "service and food are relatively decent"
Name: D Basariya
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  I was informed at the check in counter that there would be a half hour delay, and as I approached to the boarding gate, I was informed that there would be another half hour delay.  Because of the delay, I had to reschedule my next travel. The flight took off 1 hour 38 minutes late. The inflight service and food are relatively decent. Seats are quite uncomfortable.

Title: "our worst flight experience"
Name: Carrie Lobo
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  On 7th March we had a flight which was Vistara from Srinagar to Del at 15.40 hrs which would land at 16.55 hrs and Del to Goa at 18.40 hrs. Our flight from Srinagar to Delhi departed at 16.00hrs and landed at 17.30hrs by the time the aircraft could dock the bay area it was 17.50hrs. Even though Delhi airport is huge we managed to get to the security gate and got through security at 18.15hrs. Even though we knew we were getting delayed for our next flight ran to the boarding gate which was also quite far from the security area . When we reached there it was 18.30hrs and boarding gates were closed. I am well aware that once boarding gates are closed they aren't opened but since it was their flight which was delayed they and since we had already crossed security check they should have given us a call which wasn't done. Their staff didn't have any empathy towards us.  When we went to collect the baggage they made us wait for 2hrs. This was our worst flight experience

Title: "Very disappointing customer management"
Name: J Bernard
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | I booked Business Class for my route from Delhi to Chennai for my wife and me (2 tickets). At check-in, the ground staff informed me that, due to aircraft change, there are no Business seats and that we are downgraded to Economy. Until now, after numerous contact with Customer Care, I did not get any indemnification, voucher or other as a compensation. Very disappointing customer management.

Title: "Vistara is seriously lacking"
Name: A Rahman
Review: Not Verified | We were planning to fly on Premium Economy from Kolkata to Udaipur via Delhi. Due to delays on Vistara, the flight did not land in time to make the connecting flight to Udaipur - even though we were assured on the flight over to Delhi by the staff onboard that since the delay was about 40 min, the connecting flight would wait for the 20 passengers to Udaipur. At Delhi airport, the Vistara ground staff told us that the connecting flight had departed and that they were trying to figure out what to do. We were asked to reclaim our suitcases in Delhi and told that we would be booked on an Indigo flight that was due to leave in 3 hours time. No other information was provided for almost 2 hours, and we were repeatedly told when enquiring that the "seniors officers", who did not appear once in front of us were working on the issue. With less than 1 hour to go, we were handed printed paper tickets on 8x11 sheets with random passenger's barcodes on both side of the sheets of paper and told to make our way to Terminal 1. We now had to pair up with random passengers and travel together so that we could go through security at the other terminal. Nobody escorted. the group of 20 to Terminal 1, which is 20+ minutes by a shuttle bus that weaves through the city traffic to Terminal 1 from Terminal 3. We got to terminal 1 with 2 minutes before they closed baggage intake. As a premium economy passenger, the baggage allowance is 30 Kg on Vistara, and we were assured by the ground staff that the baggage allowance would be honored as Vistara had called ahead to Indigo. To our surprise, Indigo told us that no such calls were placed and that we had to pay for any excess baggage above the standard 15 Kgs. We had to shell out INR 8250 (over $100) for excess baggage just so that we could get on the flight. When I called Vistara to rectify the situation, I was placed on hold for 25 min and eventually the line was cut off. On the 2nd call, after a 15 minute conversation I was told that they could not do anything for me and that I have to return to the Vistara counter where the Indigo ticket was issued to argue my case in Delhi. When I asked to speak to a "senior", I was told that they would reach out to me in 1 to 2 hours. The calls never came. I am thoroughly disappointed with the service. My attempts to rectify the situation with Vistara was essentially ignored. While in-flight service is good, when things go wrong and when service and understanding is needed the most, Vistara is seriously lacking.

Title: "definitely fly again with Vistara"
Name: Hemant Sahu
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Flight attendants were extremely helpful, they helped us consolidate our weight and also helped us fly without any bags. Both of them help. Thank u so much Poonam. I will definitely fly again with Vistara and also recommend to others.

Title: "comfortable and a nice experience"
Name: J Lale
Review: Not Verified |  I would thoroughly recommend Vistara. We had excellent an excellent check in experience at Amritsar and flights. At Amritsar, Dominic and his supervisor helped us redistribute our baggage in order to avoid paying baggage excess charges. Thank you. We had a very tight stop over before catching the flight to Goa. The ground staff at Delhi helped us through security to ensure we arrived at the gate on time. Thank you. The flights were comfortable and a nice experience. Thank you.

Title: "I am extremely impressed by their work"
Name: Neeta Kohli
Review: ✅ Trip Verified | We boarded at Trivandrum airport. Flight attendants were extremely helpful, they helped us consolidate our weight and also helped us fly without any bags. Both of them helped with my husband to get him a wheelchair and also kept on asking if he needs a doctor, as my husband was not feeling well. I am extremely impressed by their work and very thankful to both of them and others who kept helping throughout our flight. I will definitely fly again with Vistara and also recommend to others.

Title: "very good experience with Vistara"
Name: Pooja Singh
Review: Not Verified |  So we had a connection flight from Mumbai to Delhi. It was very good experience with Vistara my First domestic flight. Crew members also very nice. I like breakfast, after 6 months return from abroad feels like home made. Thank you Vistara it was very nice journey.

Title: "Great experience"
Name: Nakul Khandelwalji
Review: Not Verified |  Great experience. The cabin crew, Food, Seat comfort, Wifi all the things were great. Glad to have a safe journey with Vistara. Satisfied with the journey.

Title: "crew friendly and resourceful"
Name: Sohil Sharma
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Early morning unplanned departure for Delhi to Mumbai, Got a good deal for the last moment price. Clean Cabin , seats, crew friendly and resourceful. New Aircraft so not much noise in the cabin. Basic Breakfast was served with a pretty satisfying with some hot drinks. Service was quick hence could catch a nice power nap as well. Did not try the entertainment system but will surely do it next time .

Title: "Super impressed with the service"
Name: Rubina Jamshidi
Review: Not Verified |  Best domestic airline I have flown with in India. New and clean aircrafts. Amazing crew members. My flight was only 1 hour 15 minutes, and the airline served full meal course and drinks, which is very unlikely these days. All my flights were on time. Super impressed with the service. Highly recommended. They provide wifi to watch movies while onboard, amazing.

Title: "one of the great airlines"
Name: V Madhusudana Rao
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Booked on 7am flight to Delhi on 12th jan. Flight got cancelled in previous day due to technical snag and i could not notice the message send. I have reached the boarding gates and then realized and staff informed me that no seats on next Delhi flights and full refund for the ticket can be made. Found that all other airline flights also going full. Airline staff offered later 9.45am flight, which will not meet my requirement. While i was trying to find a solution to reach Delhi at early, suddenly met Mr Vinod came out with idea of trying on 8am flight of Vistara as a standby and made me wait till gate closing time then board the flight. It was a great great relief. I should thank Vistara team for such wonderful support and especially Mr Vinod George. Vistara is one of the great airlines and wish them all the Best.

Title: "cabin crew were courteous"
Name: Rahul Anand
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  I didn't have check in baggage so no check in experience. Boarding experience was  totally mismanaged, no queue, no sequential boarding. Seats are better that LCC. Working IFE system and had good collection of movies. Meal served was good, cabin crew were courteous. Departed on little late and reached Delhi 15 min late. Overall mix experience.

Title: "totally loved the flight service"
Name: S Alabramian
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Service was amazing. Experienced business class service even in the economy class. Well maintained and clean flight. Spacious and the lighting and music were a great mood lifter. We were also surprised to have received free meal. We totally loved the flight service.

Title: "ground staff is so rude and ignorant"
Name: Manu Anand
Review: Not Verified | You cannot label front economy seats as Premium Economy. These are 3:3:3 layout Economy seats with no additional comfort. You just cannot change the global definition of any class for your profits. Route: FRA to DEL. On top of this your ground staff is so rude and ignorant that they won’t accommodate any requests no matter how serious.

Title: "Another flawless flight"
Name: Rajan Parrikar
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Another flawless flight from Goa to Bombay in Business Class. Vistara does everything right for the premium class, from check-in to boarding to inflight service. I rate it as the best full-service domestic airline currently operating in India. The experience could be enhanced further by offering WiFi in the aircraft.

Title: "the finest premium experience"
Name: Rajan Parrikar
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  Bombay to Goa in Business Class in an A320. Vistara currently provides the finest premium experience in India. The entire experience was flawless. Comfortable seats, warm service. There is no WiFi on this route but given the short flight time it is not an issue.

Title: "experience was extremely disappointing"
Name: G Marler
Review: ✅ Trip Verified |  The worst airline I have ever flown with. I booked and paid a premium for seating in row seven. Online check in allocated the three of us row 25. I emailed Vistara three days prior to our departure explaining that when checking in online we had been allocated the incorrect seats. No response was received. Airport check in staff either couldn’t or wouldn’t correct the obvious error and didn't seem care even though one person in our group had mobility issues. There response was that they were only responsible for checking in and it wasn’t their problem. So now I have to fill out paperwork to claim a refund for the seating I booked and paid for which was allocated to someone else. Also the people in row 24 were totally ignorant of normal polite inflight protocol and reclined their seats which affected the person in our group with the mobility issue.
